cab.content: ft 4Operations.From :- Advanced G.H;Q. France.To C,I,G,S,; War Office. Handed in 1.21 p.m. Received 1,55 p.m.CP. 395 October 30th. 12.40 p.m. Message from H.Q., R.F.C. as follows "Since the night of October 24th, no further bombingraids into Germany have taken place. The sole reason forthis has been bad weather. Fog, low clouds, rain or snowhave continually prevailed."
